entry.title: New release for Beszel: v0.5.3
entry.content:
• Add maximum 1 minute values for CPU, bandwidth, and disk I/O. (#132)
  • Add basic caching to the web app to reduce requests for the same data.
  • Fix ZFS ARC not being recorded in longer records. (#142)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/henrygd/beszel/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3

entry.title: New release for Beszel: v0.6.0
entry.content:
• Time based alerts. Please report any bugs. (#93)
  • Active alerts shown on home page.
  • Temperature alerts (#131)
  • Bandwidth alerts (#179)
  • Bandwidth displayed in dashboard table.
  • Disk usage alert now checks all disks, not only the root disk.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/henrygd/beszel/compare/v0.5.3...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Beszel: v0.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Systems can now be managed in a config.yml file inside your data directory. See <your-url>/settings/config for more information. (#70, #206)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/henrygd/beszel/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2

entry.title: New release for Beszel: v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Localization of the Hub web interface with 15 languages currently supported. We're on Crowdin if you want to help improve translations or add a language.
  • Binary installation added as an option within the "Add System" UI. (#223)
  • Ability to hide columns in the "All Systems" table.

Updates

  • Bandwidth alert max value increased to 125 MB/s (1 Gigabit). (#222)
  • Added search button and changed "‚åòK" to "Ctrl+K" on non-macOS platforms. (#219)
  • Charts display message when no records are populated, rather than showing the spinner. (#234)
  • Skip code for reading temperature sensors if SENSORS is set as an empty string. (#196)
  • Added Makefile.

Bug fixes

  • Broken "Forgot password?" link.

Huge thanks to @ArsFy for doing a ton of work on this release!

And further apologies to @alexzaitsev for accidentally deleting your Ukrainian translations üôè.

New Contributors

  • @ArsFy made their first contribution in https://github.com/henrygd/beszel/pull/233

Full Changelog: https://github.com/henrygd/beszel/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0
